timeline.title: Computer Systems Engineering
timeline.text: I'm currently stying computer systems engineer with experience in designing, developing and deploying complex systems for a variety of industries

timeline.title: JavaScript Developer
timeline.text: My web development education at Platzi covered a wide range of topics, from the foundational concepts of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, to the more complex tools and frameworks like React, TypeScript, and Redux.

timeline.title: OpenJS Node.js Application Developer (JSNAD) by Linux Foundation
timeline.text: Certifies advanced skills in Node.js development, including security, performance, and asynchronous programming.
